title: Rechargeable Battery
text:
Products Specification

  • Operation continuity: 2.3-10hours
  • Charging time: 2hours
  • Battery output: 7.4Volts / 1150mAh
  • Charger Input: AC 100-240V   50-60Hz

title: Rechargeable Battery Charger
text:
Products Specification

  • Charger output: 8.4Volts / 1,000mAh
  • Charger Input: AC 110-240V   50-60Hz

* Only for BiLumix's Rechargeable Battery

title: BiLumix GEN.1 Repair Service
